attributes.action: ALL HE CAN TO STOP ANIMAL TESTING IN THE UK BY 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ANIMAL TESTING IS WHEN AN ANIMAL IS TESTED FOR COSMETIC COMPANYS TO MAKE SURE IT WILL WORK.

IN THIS PROCEDURE THE ANIMAL ENCOUNTERS ALOT OF PAIN AND THEY EVEN DIE PLEASE SIGN THIS PETITION TO STOP THIS OR BUY COSMETICS FROM COMPANYS THAT DONT TEST ON ANIMALS.

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
